participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Reflective and cautious, often contemplating life choices due to past struggles.
participant_1.background: I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I now live in the city. I'm a recovering alcoholic. I am a 45-year-old male.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nostalgic, enjoys reminiscing about the past while caring for family.
participant_2.background: I am a stay-at-home dad. Horror movies are my favorites. I spent a decade working in the human services field. My father used to work for Home Depot.

content.text: What is your favoite movies? horror movies are my favorites.
a horror movie üé¨ i m more of a rock person
my father used to work for home depot. where do you work?
that is cool üòé my dad used to work for home depot
do you have a job? where do you work?
i do not work   just travel
i spent a decade working in the human services field. have you ever worked in your life?
i used to work in human services   i heard it all the time
<num>   and if i am not drinking   i start thinking   and i don t have good thoughts
but you have to solve them anyway. it's more easy than it frightens you
a little bit is better than nothing   thanks for the little chat
i am a stay at home dad. do you know what does it mean?
escapism yeah wish üôè i knew another language ca not learn by doing nothing
